package.description:
We are introducing a new extension “Admin Login Layout” which can change your admin login layout in just seconds. Yes. With no more coding required.
Moreover, this extension will help the non-technical users to change the layout of admin login easily without any coding. Installing this extension is as easy as pie. Features
1) Change your login layout in seconds! This extension will let you change the login layout of your admin panel. By default, Magento provides its default look and feel; there is no default feature to modify the admin login layout in Magento.
2) This extension facilitates to change the following : o Default tile of admin login o Change the default title of forgot password o Company logo o Background image o Copyright text and also the admin can apply his own CSS to the admin login page.
3) You just need to upload the recommended logo image size and background image size given in the admin.
4) Facility to add your own custom CSS to change the place of logo, text, font-size, width etc.
5) Admin can also disable this extension by selecting “Disable” from Enable Module.
